dict.acceptation: 方向，指南；指挥，指导，管理；用法说明，指示，命令，吩咐；导演，（乐队）指挥；

sent.orig: North-South direction of the yellow light, red light east-west direction, counter time 5 seconds.
sent.trans: 南北方向黄灯亮、东西方向红灯亮，计数器计时5秒。

sent.orig: Two-way linked list, first in one direction, find another direction, is connected.
sent.trans: 双向链表，首先是在一个方向，找到另一个方向，是连接。

sent.orig: The structure and traits of direction moving mechanism and direction moving mechanism with rotation were introduced.
sent.trans: 详细叙述了双向移动和单向移动加转向步履机构的结构和特点。

sent.orig: The acceleration record of the pricipai axis direction is controled by fault failure direction.
sent.trans: 对于断裂带附近的记录，其主轴方向受断层破裂方向的控制。

sent.orig: The rotation direction of impeller is based on the direction indicated by rotation arrow.
sent.trans: 叶轮旋转方向，以转向箭头所示方向为准。
